item.title: About
item.description:
Hello There! General Kenobi...

Welcome to my blog!

This is my personal website.

I use it to note, save, share, etc what I found either on the internet or by myself, and obviously mostly computer-related.

Who am I

If you want more information, don’t be afraid to contact me via the contact form!

item.title: Contact
item.description: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://garnajee.github.io/css/form.css"> <script type="text/javascript">var submitted=false;</script> <iframe name="hidden_iframe" id="hidden_iframe" style="display:none;" onload="if(submitted) {window.location='/thankyou';}"></iframe> <form action="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdx6EWgZTyYdV8V1cWGyErtoWdzWVdlhEa6fK3Rn77rBp05Ew/formResponse" method="post" target="hidden_iframe" onsubmit="submitted=true;"> <label>Full Name*</label> <input type="text" placeholder="Full Name*" class="form-input" name="entry.2105212935" required> <label>Email*</label> <input type="email" placeholder="Email*" class="form-input" name="entry.1732162515" required> <label>Subject*</label> <input type="text" placeholder="Subject*" class="form-input" name="entry.1109003079" required> <label>Message*</label> <textarea rows="5" placeholder="Enter your Message" class="form-input" name="entry.300831009" required></textarea> <button type="submit">Send</button> </form>

item.title: Thank you for submitting your message!
item.description: I’ll get back to you as soon as possible!
